item.title: xkcd2 - someone is wrong
item.description: Who was I thinking of when I read this?  Oh, there are so many people. (mouse over for alt text, funny also – you do this with all xkcd comics)

item.title: xkcd - ubuntu, python comics
item.description:
If you don’t currently read xkcd.com, you should be.  It has some mushy lovey dovey junk in it sometimes, but the python references and open source references are hilarious.

Today’s comic: (mouse over for the Ubuntu reference)
